sentence.Network_en: The Catalans declared for Charles and a civil war erupted in Valencia and Aragon.
sentence.Network_cn: 加泰罗尼亚人宣布支持查理，于是一场内战在巴伦西亚和阿拉贡两地爆发。

sentence.Network_en: Elite mercenaries, originally from Aragon, armed with javelins and light armour.
sentence.Network_cn: 加泰罗尼亚标枪兵为精锐雇佣部队, 最初来自阿拉贡, 装备标枪和轻甲.

sentence.Network_en: Henry VIII wanted to divorce Catherine of Aragon but the Pope refused.
sentence.Network_cn: 亨利八世欲与阿拉贡的凯瑟琳离婚,但是教皇拒绝了.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...电脑单机简介，作为整个守护者氏族中的最年长者和最权威的智者阿拉贡(aragon),感知到各隐藏世界(hiddenworlds)中正滋生着暗含的危机.

list.abs: 妻子：阿拉贡的凯瑟琳（Catherine of Aragon）王后 （1509年6月11日结婚，1533年取消婚姻，死于1536年1月6日）^  7.0  7.1  7.2  7.3 …

means.word_mean: 1. French writer who generalized surrealism to literature (1897-1982)
2. a region of northeastern Spain; a former kingdom that united with Castile in 1479 to form Spain (after the marriage of Ferdinand V and Isabella I)
